CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE books_table
WITH ( 
    LOCATION = 'https://storagelaas.blob.core.windows.net/boeken');

-- CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT CSVFormat
-- WITH (
--     FORMAT_TYPE = CSV
-- );
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT CSVFormat
WITH (
    FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
    FORMAT_OPTIONS (
      FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
      STRING_DELIMITER = '"',
      FIRST_ROW = 2,
      USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE,
      ENCODING = 'UTF8' )
);

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.ExternalBooksTable
(
    Title NVARCHAR(max),
    Description NVARCHAR(max),
    Authors NVARCHAR(max),
    Image NVARCHAR(max),
    PreviewLink NVARCHAR(max),
    Publisher NVARCHAR(max),
    PublishedDate NVARCHAR(max),
    InfoLink NVARCHAR(max),
    Categories NVARCHAR(max),
    RatingsCount INT
)
WITH
(
    LOCATION = '/boeken/books_data.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = books,
    FILE_FORMAT = CSVFormat
);

-- Verwijder de bestaande externe gegevensbron als deze al bestaat
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'books')
BEGIN
    DROP EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE books;
END
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'CSVFormat')
BEGIN
    DROP EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT CSVFormat;
END
IF OBJECT_ID('dbo.InternalBooksTable', 'U') IS NOT NULL
BEGIN
    DROP TABLE dbo.InternalBooksTable;
END


-- Stap 1: Maak een externe gegevensbron voor Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE books
WITH ( 
    LOCATION = 'https://storagelaas.dfs.core.windows.net/boeken'
);

-- Stap 2: Maak een externe bestandsindeling voor het CSV-bestand
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT CSVFormat
WITH (
    FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
    FORMAT_OPTIONS (
      FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
      STRING_DELIMITER = '"',
      FIRST_ROW = 2,
      USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE,
      ENCODING = 'UTF8'
    )
);

-- Stap 3: Maak een interne doel-SQL-tabel waarin de gegevens worden ingevoegd
CREATE TABLE dbo.InternalBooksTable
(
    Title NVARCHAR(4000),
    Description NVARCHAR(4000),
    Authors NVARCHAR(4000),
    Image NVARCHAR(4000),
    PreviewLink NVARCHAR(4000),
    Publisher NVARCHAR(4000),
    PublishedDate NVARCHAR(100),
    InfoLink NVARCHAR(4000),
    Categories NVARCHAR(4000),
    RatingsCount INT
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
);

-- Stap 4: Voer de COPY INTO-opdracht uit om gegevens van de externe opslag naar de interne tabel te kopiÃ«ren
COPY INTO dbo.InternalBooksTable
(
    Title,
    Description,
    Authors,
    Image,
    PreviewLink,
    Publisher,
    PublishedDate,
    InfoLink,
    Categories,
    RatingsCount
)
FROM 'https://storagelaas.dfs.core.windows.net/boeken/books_data.csv'
WITH  
(
   FILE_TYPE = 'CSV',
   FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
   ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0A',
   FIELDQUOTE = '"',
   ENCODING = 'UTF8',
   FIRSTROW = 2,
   MAXERRORS = 10,
   ERRORFILE = 'https://storagelaas.dfs.core.windows.net/boeken/errorsfolder'
);
